title: 神奇宝贝mod权利问题
author: 乔世文
txt_content: /checkspawns 这个指令怎么给玩家权限 让玩家也能用

replies.author: ven73
replies.txt_content:
mangadd 你服务器基础权限组 
minecraft.command.checkspawns
minecraft.command.checkspawns.normal

replies.author: 我很Van强
replies.txt_content:
lp group default permission set minecraft.command.checkspawns true
lp group default permission set minecraft.command.checkspawns.normal true
这两个指令

replies.author: 乔世文
replies.txt_content:
我很Van强 发表于 2020-7-22 12:11
lp group default permission set minecraft.command.checkspawns true
lp group default permission set m ...
不行 用不了
